class.name: Monk
class.hitpoint_per_level: d8 + CON modifier or 5 + CON modifier

features.name: Martial arts
features.desc: You master combat styles that use unarmed strike and monk weapons, which gives you these benefits when unarmored and unshielded:

feature_data.name: Bonus unarmed strike
feature_data.desc: Using a bonus action, you can make an extra unarmed strike.

feature_data.name: Martial arts die
feature_data.desc: Instead of using your normal damage for an unarmed strike or monk weapon, you can use this die (1d6)

feature_data.name: Dexterous attacks
feature_data.desc: Use your DEX modifier instead of STR modifier for attack/damage rolls with unarmed strikes or monk weapons. When using the grapple or shove options, you can use your DEX for the save DC as well.

features.name: Unarmored defense
features.desc: While unarmored/unshielded, your base AC = 10 + DEX modifier + WIS modifier

features.name: Monks focus
features.desc: You harness energy represented by focus points. You can use these points for the following features:

feature_data.name: Flurry of blows
feature_data.desc: Using a focus point and a bonus action, you can make two extra unarmed strikes.

feature_data.name: Patient defense
feature_data.desc: Using a bonus action, you can take the disengage action. You can also spend one focus point to take both the disengage and dash actions.

feature_data.name: Step of the wind
feature_data.desc: Using a bonus action, you can take the disengage action. You can also spend one focus point to take both the disengage and dash actions. Your jump distance is doubled for the turn.

features.name: Unarmored movement
features.desc: While unarmored/unshielded, your speed increases. see the table to see how many ft of extra movement you gain

features.name: Uncanny metabolism
features.desc: When rolling for initiative you regain all expended focus points and gain an amount of HP equal to the value of your martial arts die (after you rolled it, of course). Use once per long rest.

features.name: Monk Subclass
features.desc: Gain a subclass for your monk character

features.name: Deflect attacks
features.desc: Any attack that hits you that gives bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage, you can reduce in damage by taking a reaction. The reduction is 1d10 + DEX modifier. If you reduce damage to 0, you can choose to expend a focus point and reflect the attack force to a creature within 5ft if it was a melee attack and 60ft if it was a ranged attack. The target must succeed on a DEX saving throw or take damage equal to twice your martial arts die (rolled) + DEX modifier

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: Slow fall
features.desc: When you fall, take a reaction to reduce the fall damage by 5x your monk level

features.name: Extra attack
features.desc: You can attack twice when taking an attack action

features.name: Empowered strikes
features.desc: When dealing damage with your unarmed strike, it can deal force damage or normal damage.

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: Evasion
features.desc: When you have to make a DEX saving throw for something to take only half damage, you take no damage on success, and half damage on a fail. Does not work when incapacitated.

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: Acrobatic movement
features.desc: While unarmored/unshielded, you can move along vertical surfaces and across liquids without falling

features.name: Hightened focus
features.desc: You improve these features:

feature_data.name: Flurry of blows
feature_data.desc: Using a focus point and a bonus action, you can make three extra unarmed strikes.

feature_data.name: Patient defense
feature_data.desc: When you expend a focus point you gain temporary HP equal to two rolls of your martial arts die

feature_data.name: Step of the wind
feature_data.desc: When you expend a focus point you can take a willing creature within 5ft of you with you until the end of your turn. this does not cause an opportunity attack.

features.name: Self restoration
features.desc: On each turn you can remove one of these conditions: charmed, frightened or poisoned

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: Deflect energy
features.desc: Deflect attacks now also works against any other type of attack

features.name: Disciplined survivor
features.desc: You have proficiency for all saving throws and can use a focus point to reroll failed rolls.

features.name: Perfect focus
features.desc: When rolling for initiative and not using uncanny metabolism, you regain focus points until you have 4 if you have 3 or lower

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: Superior defense
features.desc: You cna become immune to all damage except force damage by expending 3 focus points at the start of your turn. lasts for 1 minute or until you are incapacitated

features.name: Epic boon
features.desc: You gain an Epic Boon feat or another feat you qualify for.

features.name: Body and mind
features.desc: Your DEX and WIS scores increase by 4 to a max of 25.

subclasses.name: Warrior of the elements
subclasses.desc: You get powers from the elemental planes

features.name: Elemental attunement
features.desc: On your turn you can expend a focus point to give yourself elemental energy for 10 minutes or until incapacitated. you gain these benefits:

feature_data.name: Reach
feature_data.desc: The range of your unarmed strikes is 10ft more than usual

feature_data.name: Elemental strikes
feature_data.desc: When attacking a creature with an unarmed strike and hitting it, you can choose to deal acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder damage. You also force the creature to make a STR saving throw. on a fail you can move the creature 10ft towards or away from you.

features.name: Manipulate elements
features.desc: You learn the Elementalism spell and use WIS as spellcasting ability for it

features.name: Elemental burst
features.desc: Using a magic action you can expend 2 focus points to summon a burst of elements in a 20ft radius sphere on a spot within a range of 120ft of you. It will deal one of these damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning or thunder. Creatures in this sphere must make a DEX saving throw. On fail they take damage of the chosen type with the value of 3 martial art die rolls, on success half of that

features.name: Stride of the elements
features.desc: While you are in elemental attunement, you have a fly and swim speed equal to your speed

features.name: Elemental epitome
features.desc: While you are in elemental attunement, you have these benefits:

feature_data.name: Damage resistance
feature_data.desc: You are resistent to one of these damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning or thunder. choose at the start of your turn.

feature_data.name: Destructive stride
feature_data.desc: When using step of the wind, your speed increases with 20ft until the end of your turn. During that time you can choose any creature to deal damage (1 roll of martial arts die) of one of the following types when within 5ft: acid, cold, fire, lightning or thunder

feature_data.name: Empower strikes
feature_data.desc: Once per turn you can deal extra damage equal to 1 roll of your martial arts die when you hit a creatire with an unarmed strike.

subclasses.name: Warrior of mercy
subclasses.desc: you manipulate life force of others

features.name: Hand of harm
features.desc: Once per turn when attacking a creature with an unarmed strike and hitting it, you can expend a focus point to deal extra necrotic damage equal to a roll of your martial art die + WIS modifier

features.name: Hand of healing
features.desc: Using a magic action you can expend 1 focus point and restore an amount of HP equal to your rolled martial art die + WIS modifier

features.name: Implements of mercy
features.desc: You're proficient in Insight and Medicine skills and proficient with the Herbalism kit

features.name: Physician's touch
features.desc: Your hand of harm/healing improve:

feature_data.name: Hand of harm
feature_data.desc: You now give the poisoned condition to the creature until the next turn

feature_data.name: Hand of healing
feature_data.desc: You can end these conditions when using hand of healing: Blinded, deafened, paralised, poisoned or stunned

features.name: Flurry of healing and harm
features.desc: When attacking a creature with flurry of blows you can replace an attack with hand of healing or hand of harm without expending points. use an amount of times equal to your WIS modifier and regain uses after a long rest

features.name: Hand of ultimate mercy
features.desc: Using a magic action you can touch the corpse of a dead creature and bring it back for a day  by expending 5 focus points. it'll have HP equal to 4d10 + WIS modifier. Conditions like blinded deafened paralised poisoned or stunned will be removed. Use once per long rest.

subclasses.name: Warrior of the open hand
subclasses.desc: You are master of unarmed combat

features.name: Open hand technique
features.desc: You can give a creature one of these effects when making an attack with flurry of blows

feature_data.name: Addle
feature_data.desc: The targeted creature is unable to do opportunity attacks until next turn

feature_data.name: Push
feature_data.desc: Force the targeted creature to make a STR saving throw. on fail it'll be pushed 15ft away from you

feature_data.name: Topple
feature_data.desc: Force the targeted creature to make a DEX saving throw. on fail it'll be pushed proned

features.name: Wholeness of body
features.desc: Using a bonus action, you can roll a martial arts die and regain that amount of HP + WIS modifier. you can use this an amount of times equal to your WIS modifier and regain uses after doing a long rest.

features.name: Fleet step
features.desc: Using a bonus action that's not step of the wind, you can use step of the wind immediately after that bonus action.

features.name: Quivering palm
features.desc: When attacking a creature with an unarmed strike and hitting it, you can use 4 focus points tosend lethal vibrations through the targeted creature. the vibrations last for a number of DAYS equal to your monk level. These vibrations are harmless, unless you use an action to end them. You can also take the attack action on your turn and use one of the attacks to end the vibrations (you must be on the same plane of existence). When the vibrations end, the targeted creature must make a CON saving throw. on a fail it'll take 10d12 of force damage or half of that on a success

features.name: Shadow arts
features.desc: you gain these benefits:

feature_data.name: Darkness
feature_data.desc: You can expend a focus point to cast darkness without spell components. you can see within this darkness and you can move the area of darkness within 6oft of you on the start of each turn.

feature_data.name: Darkvision
feature_data.desc: You are able to see clearly in dim light up to 60 ft as if it were bright, and in total darkness as if it were dim. However, you can only see shades of gray in darkness, not colors. if you already have darkvision the range extends by 60ft.

feature_data.name: Shadowy figments
feature_data.desc: You know the minor illusion spell and use WIS as spellcasting ability for it

features.name: Shadow step
features.desc: When in dim light or darkness you can teleport up to 60ft to another spot thats dim light or darkness using a bonus action. You also have advantage on the next melee attack you make before the end of your turn.

features.name: Improved shadow step
features.desc: You can expend a focus point to remove the requirement of dim light/darkness when using shadow step. you can make an unarmed strike directly after teleporting as part of this bonus action.

features.name: Cloak of shadows
features.desc: Using a magic action you can expend 3 focus points to surround yourself in shadows for a minute while in dim light/darkness. this grants you these benefits:

feature_data.name: Invisibility
feature_data.desc: You're invisible

feature_data.name: Partially incorporeal
feature_data.desc: You can move through occupied spaces as if they're difficult terrain (every 1ft of difficult terrain is 2ft of normal movement). when this condition ends in such position you will move back to the last unoccupied spot you were in.

feature_data.name: Shadow furry
feature_data.desc: You use no focus points when using flurry of blows
